newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: Trade in Kansas was slow Thursday, with slaughter steers and heifers steady in a light test, USDA said.

Inquiry good, demand fair. Sales confirmed on 1200 slaughter steers and 2000 slaughter heifers Thursday. For the week to date 89000 head confirmed including 17400 head or about 20 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle.
Slaughter steers Select and Choice 2-3 1200-1275 lbs 72.00; pen Select with end Choice 1300 lbs 71.00.
Dressed basis load Select to mostly Choice 1300 lb Holsteins 110.00, hot weights, delivered.
Slaughter heifers Select and Choice 2-3 1000-1150 lbs 72.00; pen mixed Commercial to Choice 1150 lb heifers and heiferettes 71.00.
week to date: 89000 last week: 79500 last year: 66400
